headline: Dayforce’s stock wasn’t getting enough love, so Thoma Bravo stepped in with $12 billion

headline: Thoma Bravo Adds Dayforce To Growing Software Portfolio In $12 Billion Deal
summary: Private-equity firm Thoma Bravo agreed to buy Dayforce in a deal valued at $12.3 billion, including debt. Dayforce stock popped earlier this on reports of a deal.
